title: Crystal Palace in talks to sign Inter Milan forward Eder
description: Crystal Palace have entered talks to sign Inter Milan forward Eder, according to Sky sources.
content: Sky Sports News understands the 31-year-old is valued at Â£10m by the Serie A side.The Italy international has not started a single game for Inter in the Italian top flight this season and has scored once in 16 substitute appearances.Sky Sports News reported on Monday that Inter are interested in a loan deal for Liverpool striker Daniel Sturridge with an option to buy for the 28-year-old.Liverpool will allow him to leave for Serie A, so Sturridge is facing a straight choice between staying at Liverpool or leaving for Inter Milan, according to Sky sources.Crystal Palace's move for West Ham striker Diafra Sakho broke down earlier this month despite both clubs having reportedly agreed a fee.
